verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
How long will ye <S%H3013>vex<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, And <S%H1792>break<s%> me in pieces with <S%H4405>words<s%>?
These <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> have ye <S%H3637>reproached<s%> <S%H954>me<s%>: Ye are not ashamed that ye deal hardly with <S%H1970>me<s%>.
And be it <S%H551>indeed<s%> that I have <S%H7686>erred<s%>, Mine <S%H4879>error<s%> remaineth with <S%H3885>myself<s%>.
If <S%H551>indeed<s%> ye will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> yourselves against <S%H3198>me<s%>, And plead against me my <S%H2781>reproach<s%>;
Know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H645>now<s%> that <S%H433>God<s%> hath <S%H5791>subverted<s%> me in my <S%H5362>cause<s%>, And hath compassed me with his <S%H4686>net<s%>.
Behold <S%H6817><s%>, I cry out of <S%H2555>wrong<s%>, but I am not <S%H6030>heard<s%>: I <S%H7768>cry<s%> for <S%H4941>help<s%>, but there is no justice.
He hath walled <S%H1443>up<s%> my <S%H734>way<s%> that I cannot <S%H5674>pass<s%>, And hath <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in my <S%H5410>paths<s%>.
He hath <S%H6584>stripped<s%> me of my <S%H3519>glory<s%>, And <S%H5493>taken<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%> from my <S%H7218>head<s%>.
He hath <S%H5422>broken<s%> me down on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, and I am <S%H3212>gone<s%>; And my <S%H8615>hope<s%> hath he <S%H5265>plucked<s%> up like a <S%H6086>tree<s%>.
He hath also <S%H2734>kindled<s%> his <S%H639>wrath<s%> against <S%H2803>me<s%>, And he counteth me unto him as one of his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>.
His <S%H1416>troops<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H3162>together<s%>, And cast <S%H5549>up<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> against <S%H2583>me<s%>, And encamp round <S%H5439>about<s%> my <S%H168>tent<s%>.
He hath <S%H7368>put<s%> my <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3045>me<s%>, And mine acquaintance are wholly estranged from <S%H2114>me<s%>.
My <S%H7138>kinsfolk<s%> have <S%H2308>failed<s%>, And my familiar <S%H3045>friends<s%> have forgotten <S%H7911>me<s%>.
They that <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%>, and my <S%H519>maids<s%>, <S%H2803>count<s%> me for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>; I am an <S%H5237>alien<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
I <S%H7121>call<s%> unto my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and he giveth me no <S%H6030>answer<s%>, Though I <S%H2603>entreat<s%> him <S%H1119>with<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
My <S%H7307>breath<s%> is <S%H2114>strange<s%> to my <S%H802>wife<s%>, And my <S%H2589>supplication<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of mine own <S%H990>mother<s%>.
Even young <S%H5759>children<s%> <S%H3988>despise<s%> <S%H6965>me<s%>; If I arise, they speak against <S%H1696>me<s%>.
All my <S%H5475>familiar<s%> <S%H4962>friends<s%> <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H157>me<s%>, And they whom I loved are turned against <S%H2015>me<s%>.
My <S%H6106>bone<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> to my <S%H5785>skin<s%> and to my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, And I am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> with the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of my <S%H8127>teeth<s%>.
Have <S%H2603>pity<s%> upon <S%H2603>me<s%>, have pity upon <S%H7453>me<s%>, O ye my friends; For the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> hath touched <S%H5060>me<s%>.
Why do ye <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me as <S%H410>God<s%>, And are not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>?
Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%> were <S%H645>now<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%>! Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> they were <S%H2710>inscribed<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%>!
That with an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5842>pen<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> They were <S%H2672>graven<s%> in the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>!
But as for me I <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, And at <S%H314>last<s%> he will <S%H6965>stand<s%> up upon the <S%H6083>earth<s%>:
And <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H5785>skin<s%>, even this <S%H5362>body<s%>, is destroyed, Then without my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall I <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H433>God<s%>;

Whom <S%H2372>I<s%>, even I, shall see, on my <S%H5869>side<s%>, And mine eyes shall <S%H7200>behold<s%>, and not as a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>. My <S%H3629>heart<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed<s%> within <S%H2436>me<s%>.
If ye <S%H559>say<s%>, How we will <S%H7291>persecute<s%> <S%H8328>him<s%>! And that the root of the <S%H1697>matter<s%> is found in <S%H4672>me<s%>;

Be ye <S%H1481>afraid<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: For <S%H2534>wrath<s%> bringeth the <S%H5771>punishments<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, That ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> there is a <S%H1779>judgment<s%>.
